Ohio Grannys Garden School uses the school grounds
to help kids discover the nature in their own back yards, experience the
satisfaction of growing and preparing their own food and the simple pleasure
of picking a flower. BEGIN: Constant Contact Standard Email List Button Join

Gardens We commend the Loveland school board, superintendent
and principals for creating an environment where an organization such as
ours could evolve. Their willingness to expand educational opportunities
outside of the four walls of the traditional classroom make it possible
to offer a unique learning opportunity to our students. Home Contact www.grannysgardenschool.com Webmaster Loveland
